title: Project-Based Education for Soft Skills Development for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, aiming to improve work efficiency for administrative/managerial professionals

learning_goals: Learners apply communication skills for effective collaboration with team members in work-related projects with over 80% accuracy
Learners achieve constructive resolutions in over 70% of conflict situations using nonviolent communication techniques
Learners apply audience engagement techniques in at least two out of three verbal presentations of project outcomes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
